scripts.admin:codes:new: node -e "(async()=>{const{PrismaClient}=require('@prisma/client');const p=new PrismaClient();const code='AFF-'+Math.random().toString(36).slice(2,8).toUpperCase();const invite=await p.inviteCode.create({data:{code,maxUses:process.env.MAX_USES?parseInt(process.env.MAX_USES):1,label:process.env.LABEL||null,expiresAt:process.env.EXPIRES_AT?new Date(process.env.EXPIRES_AT):null}});console.log('Created invite code:',invite);await p.$disconnect();process.exit(0)})().catch(async e=>{console.error(e);process.exit(1)})"
